description:
This a minor feature request made by one of our community members for an enhancement to the Fineract platform. There is a corresponding front-end UI task that can be completed as well.

## Task Description ##
Just as one can edit the submitted on date for a client after it's been created, so should a user be able to edit the submitted on date for a group after it's been created.

Full details at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/FINERACT-618

Corresponding UI ticket on Github Issues for Mifos X Web App https://github.com/openMF/community-app/issues/2935
name: Mifos - FINERACT-618 - Allow for Submitted On Date to be Edited for Groups
